body: This card bears the image of a moonstone gem with the appropriate number of wishes shown as gleams therein; sometimes it depicts a moon with its phase indicating the number of wishes (full = four; gibbous = three; half = two; quarter = one). These wishes are the same as those granted by the 9th-level wizard spell and must be used within a number of minutes equal to the number received.
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Magic Items/Artifacts/Minor Artifacts/Deck of Many Things/Description/Moon
name: Moon
